titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Cote D'Ivoire
Cote D'Ivoire

div.head: Legislation
div.p: In general, documents are restricted for 50 years.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Boulevard Agoulevant, BP V109, Abidjan â€“ Plateau National Archives, 1 rue van Vollenhoven, BP V-126, Abidjan

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact both the Foreign Ministry and the National Archives with a detailed description of the proposed research and the types of documents they would like to view.
